Title: Microsoft 365: People Skills profile editing improvements
Description:
People Skills is releasing two updates to give you more control over how others see your skills profile and ease of access for skill profile management. With these updates, you can easily control the order in which the skills you confirm are displayed to others in your profile card. Additionally, you'll find a new deep link directly to skill profile editing from the Skills component on the profile card. These updates will begin rollout to customers in November and are expected to be available to all People Skills customers by December.
GA date: December CY2025
